results.content:
learning coding is harder on udemy, because 720 video is hard to see the lines of code sometimes.
and also the video player isn't responsive enough. i need to pause it so I can keep up with the coding, but when I click pause it doesn't pause, I have to keep clicking up to 5 times and wiggle the mouse to activate the player controls. its really frustrating.
results.content_html:
learning coding is harder on udemy, because 720 video is hard to see the lines of code sometimes.
and also the video player isn't responsive enough. i need to pause it so I can keep up with the coding, but when I click pause it doesn't pause, I have to keep clicking up to 5 times and wiggle the mouse to activate the player controls. its really frustrating.

results.content: Straight to the point overview of React library. Great if you need a refresher after some time.
results.content_html: Straight to the point overview of React library. Great if you need a refresher after some time.

results.content: It moves at a clip, so you'll find yourself needing to supplement with some Google searching to get a grasp on it all. But the code is current, and functions. And it does exactly what it says it will do in the description: give you a quick dive into React coding. Recommend for a quick intro...
results.content_html: It moves at a clip, so you'll find yourself needing to supplement with some Google searching to get a grasp on it all. But the code is current, and functions. And it does exactly what it says it will do in the description: give you a quick dive into React coding. Recommend for a quick intro...

results.content: The course is excellent it covers some major things used in working environment but when it gets complicated it accelerate too fast to understand clearly so i needed to rewind too many times that it gets frustrating.
results.content_html: The course is excellent it covers some major things used in working environment but when it gets complicated it accelerate too fast to understand clearly so i needed to rewind too many times that it gets frustrating.

results.content: Loved the simplicity of this course and the way it was carried forward. The last two sections were a bit rushed up but I think its still good.
results.content_html: Loved the simplicity of this course and the way it was carried forward. The last two sections were a bit rushed up but I think its still good.

results.content: Codes are small hard to see and windows position often opened too top or in some times went too bottom, hides the subtitle. Else was great explaining all in a packed one hour. Thanks!
results.content_html: Codes are small hard to see and windows position often opened too top or in some times went too bottom, hides the subtitle. Else was great explaining all in a packed one hour. Thanks!

results.content: The course was a good basic introduction to React. The short sections and up and down volume were a bit jarring. And then it just ended with some PDFs without even a thank you and goodbye!"
results.content_html: The course was a good basic introduction to React. The short sections and up and down volume were a bit jarring. And then it just ended with some PDFs without even a thank you and goodbye!"

results.content:
Its been amazing so far. Delivery is on point and communication is very clear. Instructor comes across very knowledgeable in subject matter.
Enjoying myself!!!
